issue.subject: Added parameter documentation for FME connector
issue.description:
* Modification of the FME and FME Server plugins
* Add a help tooltip (as for other plugins)
!18810_access_tooltip.png!
* The content of the help must help an EXTRACT administrator to create an FME script compatible with EXTRACT
* It should describe past variables, their names, types and example data.
** Perimeter (and its encoding in WKT WGS84)
** Product (string, external product ID)
** FolderOut (output folder used for FME desktop)
** Parameters (describe their encoding and dynamic aspect)
* Explain the return values to give (difference between FME desktop and server)
* for FME Server -> specify that the "Data Download" service should be used and not "Job Submitter".

*Public parameters to be used in an FME script*
!18810-FME_published_parameters.png!

Source (french) : https://projets.asitvd.ch/issues/18810

custom_fields.name: Ergonomic impact
custom_fields.value: User have in app help to write FME scripts parameters
